message.raw:
Fixed some problems with remote_value_checking code

* If remote_value_checking is enabled, program_manual() is not called on initialisation. Instead remote values are checked.
* If you selected remote values to resolve an inconsistency, an internal variable was not updated correctly and would present the remote values changed dialog repeatedly
* If you have a DDS object that does not have all sub channels present (Eg Novatech does not have a gate), then the remote_values_chaged dialog would display generic information for that subchanel (Eg "Gate: TextLabel")

  • If you have a DDS object that does not have all sub channels present (Eg Novatech does not have a gate), then the remote_values_chaged dialog would display generic information for that subchanel (Eg "Gate: TextLabel")

message:
Fixed some problems with remote_value_checking code

* If remote_value_checking is enabled, program_manual() is not called on initialisation. Instead remote values are checked.
* If you selected remote values to resolve an inconsistency, an internal variable was not updated correctly and would present the remote values changed dialog repeatedly
* If you have a DDS object that does not have all sub channels present (Eg Novatech does not have a gate), then the remote_values_chaged dialog would display generic information for that subchanel (Eg "Gate: TextLabel")
